markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 3"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Channel Protection Amulet](/Equipment.aspx?ID=421)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 608 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 56 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This nugget of polished tektite is trapped in a cage of braided wire and hangs from a silken cord. When wearing this amulet, you gain resistance 5 against damage from [_harm_](/Spells.aspx?ID=146) spells if you’re living, or against [_heal_](/Spells.aspx?ID=148) spells if you’re undead.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Channel Protection Amulet
